questions.instructions: Complete the notes below using NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS AND/OR A NUMBER
questions.question: Complete the following:
field_labels: 1. The owner wants to rent the house by ________
2. The woman will come to look at the house this ________
3. The woman will need to have her own ________
5. The garden is slightly longer than ________
questions.incorrect_feedback: Not quite. Listen to the audio again and check the transcript.
questions.no_answer_feedback: The correct answer is shown above. Listen carefully and take notes while listening.

questions.instructions: Label the map below using NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS
questions.question: Label the map locations (Questions 6-10):
questions.incorrect_feedback: Not quite. Review the map and listen again.
questions.no_answer_feedback: The correct answer is shown above.

questions.instructions: Which TWO of the following does the chef say are true of the herb oregano? Choose TWO letters A-F.
questions.question: Select the TWO correct answers:

mc_options.text: A. It's easy to sprinkle on food
C. It's used in the majority of Italian dishes
D. It has a lemony flavour
E. It gives food a rounded flavour
F. It's a good accompaniment to many meat dishes

questions.correct_feedback: Correct! The answers are C and F.
questions.incorrect_feedback: Not quite. The correct answers are C and F. Listen again for what the chef says about oregano.
questions.no_answer_feedback: The correct answers are C and F.

_metadata.description: This is an example JSON file demonstrating the IELTS Course Manager import format. Questions 1-5 are open questions (one object with 5 fields). Questions 6-10 are also open questions (another object with 5 fields). Questions 11-12 are a multiple choice with 2 correct answers (one object that counts as 2 questions). Total: 12 questions.
